features: Fifty packets of 1 coated tablet of Advil Multi Symptom Cold and Flu Medicine, Cold Medicine for Adults with Ibuprofen, Phenylephrine HCL and Chlorpheniramine Maleate
Powerful Ibuprofen 200mg, chlorpheniramine maleate 4mg and phenylephrine HCL 10 mg tablets for multi-symptom relief
Uniquely formulated to fight common cold and flu symptoms, providing nasal congestion, nasal swelling, sneezing, sinus pressure, headache, fever, body aches and runny nose relief
Cold medicine for adults available in easy-to-take coated tablet form
For use by people 12 years of age and older
Take one tablet every four hours while symptoms persist
body.description: Advil Multi Symptom Cold and Flu Medicine is a cold medicine for adults that is uniquely formulated with three active ingredients to relieve your toughest cold and flu symptoms. Combining a pain reliever and fever reducer with a nasal decongestant and an antihistamine, this cold and flu medicine helps you temporarily tackle symptoms associated with influenza and the common cold. It also provides nasal swelling relief and restores freer breathing through your nose with a single dose. These powerful over-the-counter cold and flu tablets contain ibuprofen for body aches and headache relief, phenylephrine HCL for nasal congestion relief, and chlorpheniramine maleate for sneezing, runny nose and sinus pressure relief. Available in easy-to-take coated tablets, Advil Multi Symptom Cold and Flu helps you stay active when symptoms strike. Cancel your cold, not your plans, by taking one tablet every four hours. Experience the power of Advil, now for cold and flu.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features & Benefits Delivers Relief When cold and flu symptoms threaten to keep you in bed, reach for Advil Multi-Symptom Cold & Flu, an over-the-counter solution that provides effective relief when you need it most. Toughest Symptoms One powerful pill contains cold and flu relief for symptoms like nasal congestion, nasal swelling, runny nose, sneezing, sinus pressure, headache, fever and body aches. 3-Ingredient Formula The unique three-ingredient formula uses pain reliever (Ibuprofen), nasal decongestant (Phenylephrine HCI) and antihistamine (Chlorpheniramine Maleate) to provide relief and get you back on your feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works EVERYTIME! The only medication we keep in stock now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a perfect addition to the new teacher welcome packs we put together. It was a good price and the perfect size. Super easy to stash away in a desk drawers or a backpack without taking up a bunch of space. I plan on buying more so I can personally use them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neatly packaged that fits perfectly in home-built first aid kits for outdoors
reviews.reviewText: I create my own first-aid kits for the outdoors (plus home, etc). I keep about 5 packets of these in each first-aid kit. These came with an expiration date of 5/2024. I received them on 8/2023, effectively giving my batch 9 months before "expiring." While that is a very short expiration span, I am not worried about them 'expiring.' Based on my long experiences in first aid training, reading research papers on the expiration date dilemma on drugs, and working in the pharmaceutical sector in my younger years, these Advil packets that are sealed tightly in foil packets will last for a few years.This product is good for 'multi symptoms,' which is why I selected these for my first-aid kits. They key is the ingredients. Heck, the formula is the exact same for some Advil products under different naming schemes. Another reviewer said they received some 40 packets. Out of curiosity, I counted mine. All advertised 50 packets were included.
